abstract.p: List of some current travel discount offerings (S)

block.p: RED SEA RETREAT: The new Ritz-Carlton, Sharm el Sheikh has a rate of $160 a night through June 30 for a single or double room. That price, for a package called the Red Sea Retreat, includes daily breakfast buffet, one of several spa treatments and use of the fitness center. The package is not valid from Wednesday to Jan. 11; March 16 to 20, and April 17 to 28. The 307-room hotel, which opened last month on the southern Sinai Peninsula, overlooks a reef where diving can be arranged. There are several pools and three lighted tennis courts. For reservations: (800) 241-3333.

BURGUNDY BY BARGE: For travelers willing to take a chance on March weather in Burgundy, Continental Waterways has an eight-night package for $1,999 a person, double occupancy, that includes a six-night barge trip on the 24-passenger Mirabelle; round-trip air fare from more than 100 cities in the United States, including New York, and two nights' accommodation in Paris, with Continental breakfast and hotel taxes. On the boat, which cruises between Dijon and Vandenesse-en-Auxois, all meals, bar drinks and wine with lunch and dinner are included, as well as sightseeing. Departures from the United States are March 3, 10, 17 and 24. For information and reservations, call (800) 676-6613. On the Internet: www .continentalwaterways.com.

PACKAGES TO EUROPE: London, Paris, Madrid and Milan are featured in three-night packages from Destination Europe, the tour division of Auto Europe, the car rental company. From New York or Boston, the London packages start at $493 a person, double occupancy; Paris, $570; Madrid, $683 until March 2, then $740, and Milan, $679. The packages include round-trip air fare, lodging, daily Continental breakfast and a three-day standard-shift economy car rental. Sample hotels include the Thistle Kensington Palace in London and the Mercure Lafayette in Paris.

The packages are offered from Jan. 10 to April 12, though it may be difficult to get reservations toward the end of that period. For reservations or more information: (800) 835-1555 or on the Internet: www .skydrive.com.

YANGTZE CRUISE: A six-night trip to China from TBI Tours, including a four-night Yangtze River cruise, starts at $1,534 a person, with round-trip air fare from New York. The package also includes hotel rooms in Beijing and Shanghai; daily breakfast; four lunches, and three dinners. The river trip, on a Regal China Cruises ship, includes a tour of the Three Gorges Dam site. Optional tours and additional hotel nights are available at extra cost. Departures are from late April to mid-November, with the $1,534 price in effect early and late in the season. From mid-July to mid-August, the price is $1,734. Information or reservations: (800) 223-0266.
